rules_text:
When Lumpen Calumny enters the battlefield, journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven’t already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
Unearth {2}{B}{B} [i]({2}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
